name: UltimateBelts_Owoshima-Mod
title: Ultimate Belts_Owoshima-Mod
author: Tyarns_Owoshima(Mod)
description: This mod adds an additional five tiers of belts to the game, beyond what is currently available from other mods. The fastest belt in this mod is equivalent to 6 express belts. Modified by Owoshima to adjust the bet speeds to acheive close to the new max belt speed.
